name: 出血之刃
description: 对单个目标造成120%攻击力的伤害，并施加流血状态
code: function executeSkill(context) { const sourcePiece = context.piece; const targetEnemy = selectTarget({ type: 'piece', range: 5, filter: 'enemy' }); if (!targetEnemy || targetEnemy.needsTargetSelection) { return targetEnemy; } const damage = Math.round(sourcePiece.attack * context.skill.powerMultiplier); const damageResult = dealDamage(sourcePiece, targetEnemy, damage, 'physical', context.battle, context.skill.id); if (damageResult.success) { addStatusEffectById(targetEnemy.instanceId, 'bleeding'); } return { message: sourcePiece.templateId + '使用出血之刃，对' + targetEnemy.templateId + '造成' + damage + '点伤害，并施加了流血状态', success: true }; }
